sentences.en: "Getting nowhere fast," pronounced Crosby, "that's what we're doing."
sentences.cn: 克罗斯比断言说：“我们一无所获，在做无用功。”

sentences.en: A fishing boat came out of nowhere, dead ahead.
sentences.cn: 一艘渔船不知从什么地方冒了出来，就在正前方。

sentences.en: At dusk we pitched camp in the middle of nowhere.
sentences.cn: 黄昏时，我们在茫茫荒野中扎营。

sentences.en: being angry would get her nowhere.
sentences.cn: 发火对她毫无益处。

sentences.en: Eric, as elusive as ever, was nowhere to be found.
sentences.cn: 埃里克总是这样神出鬼没，哪儿也找不着。

sentences.en: He had gone out to get the gin. The cigarettes were nowhere.
sentences.cn: 他去外边拿杜松子酒了，烟不知放哪儿了。

sentences.en: He has nowhere to stick up his posters.
sentences.cn: 他没地方贴海报了。

sentences.en: he'll get nowhere with her, he's too young.
sentences.cn: 他和她之间的关系不会取得任何进展，他太年轻了。

sentences.en: he's nowhere near as popular as he used to be.
sentences.cn: 他远不像以前那样受欢迎了。

sentences.en: Heavenly music swelled from nowhere.
sentences.cn: 不知从何处响起天籁般的音乐。

sentences.en: Houses had sprung up out of nowhere on the hills.
sentences.cn: 山丘上突然冒出一幢幢的房子。

sentences.en: It must be terribly frustrating to lobby and get absolutely nowhere.
sentences.cn: 游说未取得一点结果，一定让人非常沮丧。

sentences.en: It was nowhere near as painful as David had expected.
sentences.cn: 这远不如戴维所料想的那么痛苦。

sentences.en: Nowhere is drug abuse more of a problem than in the US.
sentences.cn: 没有什么地方的吸毒问题比美国更严重。

sentences.en: Oh, stop it! This is getting us nowhere.
sentences.cn: 哦，停下！这样不会有结果的。

sentences.en: The bowlers at the eye of the storm were nowhere in evidence.
sentences.cn: 处于风口浪尖的那些投手不见了踪影。

sentences.en: The escaped prisoner was nowhere in sight.
sentences.cn: 越狱的囚犯已经无影无踪了。

sentences.en: There was nowhere to hide and nowhere to run.
sentences.cn: 无处可藏，也无处可逃。

sentences.en: They are nowhere near good enough.
sentences.cn: 他们还远不够好。

sentences.en: they came from nowhere to win in the last three strokes of the race.
sentences.cn: 他们出人意料地以最后三桨赢得了划艇比赛。

words.tran_cn: 不存在的；毫无结果的；不知名的
无处；任何地方都不；毫无结果
无处；任何地方；无名之地

phrases.tran_cn: 没有出路的处境；不可能成功的行动
突然出现（或发生)，出人意料地出现（或发生）
不知打哪儿来；突然冒出来；莫名其妙的出现

trans.tran_cn: 不存在的；毫无结果的；不知名的

trans.tran_en: not in any place or to any place

trans.tran_cn: 无处；任何地方；无名之地
